question: Which of the following statements is NOT true regarding the Vitamin C?
option1: Only Vitamin C is to be taken externally, all others are produced in the human body.
option2: Vitamin C is the only vitamin which is also a hormone.
option3: Scurvy is caused by the deficiency of Vitamin C
option4: Vitamin C is a water-soluble vitamin.
answer: Vitamin C is the only vitamin which is also a hormone.
explanation: Vitamin C is a water-soluble vitamin. Scurvy is caused by the deficiency of Vitamin C. Human body cannot produce vitamin C hence it is taken externally. Vitamin C is not a hormone.
